name: Klone Karts
description:
• WASD/Arrows: Movement
  • Space: Use Abilities
  • Clones repeat your previous laps, using power-ups included
  • Green Blocks: Swap obstacles on track
  • Blue Blocks: Get Random Power-up

You have been found guilty of your crimes. 

Your punishment? To race the loop, until dead. 

The infamous Klone Karts arena creates lesser versions of you to keep costs low, and to ensure that you do not make it out alive. You are doomed, but you might as well not your name be forgotten. Don't forget. Klone see, klone do.
